subject: Web3
title: Stablecoins in DeFi
description: A short lesson to help you apply Stablecoins in DeFi.

hook.text: You can't build a financial system on assets that swing 20% daily. Stablecoins solved that problem.

buildup.text: Stablecoins like USDC and DAI are pegged to the US dollar. One token always equals roughly one dollar.

discovery.text: They became the backbone of DeFi. Most lending, trading, and yield farming involves stablecoins.

twist.text: Not all stablecoins are stable. TerraUSD lost its peg in 2022 and collapsed to zero, destroying $40 billion.

climax.text: DeFi needs stablecoins to function. But trusting a 'stable' coin requires trusting how it maintains its peg.

punchline.text: DeFi runs on digital dollars. Not all of them stay at a dollar.

quiz.question: Why are stablecoins important in DeFi?
options: They provide price stability needed for financial products
